nape.phys.GravMassMode

type
class
metadata
:final
Enumeration of GravMassMode values for a Body.

Static Variables

DEFAULT(accessor,null) : GravMassMode

Default method of computation.

Mass seen by gravity equal to the Body mass.

FIXED(accessor,null) : GravMassMode

Fixed method of computation.

Mass seen by gravity set by user.

SCALED(accessor,null) : GravMassMode

Scaled method of computation.

Mass seen by gravity computed as a factor of the Body mass with scaling factor set by user.

Constructor

new()
